text: Fabio Menta is an Italian coach and former player who last coached the Foton Tornadoes which competed as the Foton Pilipinas at the 2016 Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship. Menta has also coached the women's national team of the Cook Islands. He was hired by the Foton Tornadoes in August 2016 to lead them at the 2016 Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship where they competed as "Foton Pilipinas". Menta led Foton at the 2016 Select Tuna Thailand Volleyball Championship, which was part of the club's preparation for the Asian club stint. He resigned from Foton on September 24, 2016. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Syracuse, Sicily Category:Italian volleyball coaches Category:Italian men's volleyball players Category:Expatriate sportspeople in the Cook Islands Category:Italian expatriates in the Philippines
title: Fabio Menta
